com.risk.controller

Class MapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.controller.MapController

  • public class MapController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handle event when user interacts UI during the map stage

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attack()
      After gather countries and dices info, pass them to model to execute the attack
      void disableFortification()
      Since fortification can only be done once, so call it after one successful fortification

      Called when user entered number of armies moved value and press enter button, pass event to View

      Prepare all necessary map component for the next phase, then enter the next phase Called when user clicked the next phase button

        public void disableFortification()

      • skipFortificationPhase

        public void skipFortificationPhase()
        During fortification phase, skip this phase if current user is not able to move armies i.e. only has one country left or the user does not want to Called by 'Skip' button on PhaseView

      • quitGame

        public void quitGame()
        Called by MenuController when user quit the game from menu
